about.title: About Janeh by Manoush
about.heroSubtitle: Where Armenian heritage meets contemporary elegance
about.heritageBody: Janeh by Manoush is rooted in centuries of Armenian artistry. Each piece carries the heritage of our ancestors, blending traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. We believe that every detail tells a story of culture, art, and identity.
about.quoteText: Our legends tell the rich stories of our ancestors, who are the roots of our art.
about.craftSubtitle: Combination of classical art and modern design
about.craftHandicraftBody: Every piece is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail in each creation.
about.craftDesignBody: Our designs are drawn from tradition and reimagined for today. From sketch to finished piece, we combine classical motifs with modern sensibility.
about.craftCollectionsBody: From delicate everyday pieces to statement jewelry for special occasions, we create collections that become a part of your story.
about.ctaHeading: We create jewelry not just to wear, but also to inherit
about.paragraph1: Janeh by Manoush is a handcrafted jewelry brand founded with the belief that every piece of jewelry should tell a story. Our collections are designed with passion, precision, and a deep love for timeless beauty.
about.paragraph2: Each piece is carefully crafted using ethically sourced materials, blending traditional Armenian artistry with contemporary design. From delicate everyday pieces to statement jewelry for special occasions, we create accessories that become a part of your story.
about.paragraph3: We believe in quality over quantity, sustainability, and the power of personal expression through beautiful jewelry.
about.qualityDesc: Every piece is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail in each creation.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We use ethically sourced materials and sustainable practices, because beautiful jewelry should never come at the planet's expense.
about.expressionDesc: Rooted in centuries of Armenian artistry, our designs honor tradition while embracing modern aesthetics and personal expression.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heroSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.inquiriesDesc: Whether you're looking for a bespoke commission or have questions about our latest collection, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.subtitle: Send us a message and we'll get back to you shortly.
contact.studioAddressValue: 123 Artisan Way, Suite 400 / Design District, NY 10012

ringSizeGuide.title: Ring Size Guide
ringSizeGuide.intro: Finding the right ring size ensures a comfortable fit for your handcrafted silver piece. Our rings are made to order in standard sizes; use this guide to measure at home.
ringSizeGuide.howTo: Wrap a strip of paper or string around the base of your finger where the ring will sit. Mark where it overlaps, then measure the length in millimetres. Match the result to our size chart, or send us your measurement and we will recommend the best size.
ringSizeGuide.tips: Fingers can vary slightly with temperature and time of day. For the most accurate fit, measure in the evening when fingers are typically at their largest. If you are between sizes, we recommend choosing the larger size for comfort.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.intro: We ship our handcrafted silver jewelry with care so it reaches you in perfect condition. All orders are packed in protective packaging and can be sent worldwide.
shipping.options: Standard delivery typically takes 5–7 business days within the region; express options are available at checkout. International delivery times vary by destination. Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location and the option you choose.
shipping.tracking: Once your order has been dispatched, you will receive an email with a tracking link so you can follow your package until it arrives. If you have any questions about your delivery, our team is here to help.

care.title: Jewelry Care
care.intro: With a little care, your silver jewelry from Janeh by Manoush will keep its beauty for years. Silver can tarnish over time; simple habits help preserve its shine and finish.
care.storage: Store your pieces in a dry place, ideally in a soft pouch or a jewelry box away from direct sunlight and humidity. Keep silver separate from other metals to avoid scratches. Removing rings and bracelets before hand washing or applying lotions helps prevent buildup.
care.cleaning: To restore shine, gently wipe your silver with a soft, lint-free cloth. For deeper cleaning, use a mild soap and water, then dry thoroughly. Avoid harsh chemicals and abrasive materials. With minimal care, each piece will continue to reflect the craftsmanship that went into it.
